links.text:
In response to the presence of COVID-19 in Nashville, we have implemented a limited visitor policy for all our hospitals and clinics. Find the latest visitor policy and other coronavirus-related information for employees and patients of VUMC at VUMC.org/coronavirus.
Please note that if you have been tested at VUMC for coronavirus infection, you will find your test results in your My Health at Vanderbilt account when they are ready.
